Posts.Content: Hopefully with them reducing it next time I will be ok. Going to talk things through on Tuesday when I see my on oncologist.  Feel like I’m housebound for 2 weeks after chemo as no energy to do or go anywhere
Posts.Title: Delaying treatment

Posts.Content: I had 2 chemo sessions so far and have ended up both times in hospital. I’m due another lot next week which hopefully they will reduce the meds as there to strong for me. Hopefully won’t end up in hospital again.  I’m due my 4 chemo on the 15th Dec and don’t want to risk going into hospital over Christmas. Just wondered has anyone asked about delaying there treatment by a week or so. I’m at my oncologist appointment on tues so will ask about it..
Posts.Title: Delaying treatment

Posts.Content: Thanks. Not rang them yet as seem to have settled will ring tomorrow if any change.
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Fed up now. Been up most of the night in pain. Going to ring th hospital. Sure after 12 days post op,should be in so much pain..
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Mines still swollen but more uncomfortable were the nodes was took out. My wasn’t under my armpit abit further down. Scar looks very red as it’s rubbing on my bra strap.. Yesterday it was really sore and seemed to be in a lot of pain today soreness has gone but swelling and soreness still there.
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I had a lumpectomy 8 days ago been ok until yesterday started getting pain. Today got up and my breast seems to have swelled. Is it normal or do I need it checking out.very tender to the touch as well.
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Not warm to touch but it’s aching a lot. Will ring the ward and see what they say..
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Got to up my pain killers. I’m at clinic on tues so will see how things are then..
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Rang the ward this morning. Going to get checked out later.
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Saw nurse who said I need to see doc. There's a bit of swelling but not enough to drain it. Got to keep an eye on it.
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Thanks leolady. Rang the ward going at 11 to be checked
Posts.Title: Swelling after 8 days free lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed in sept with breast cancer. It was caught early  and I’ve had 4 sessions of chemo each one ended up in hospital as it didn’t agree with me. Chemo worked and shrunk my cancer. I had a lumpectomy 9 days ago. Got to have 3 weeks of radiotherapy but not sure if I can go through with it.  I’m so tired after struggling with the chemo and just had enough. What would happen if I didn’t go through  with it...
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Thank you. I'm seeing my oncologist in 2 weeks time so will talk things through with her. I'm so tired and not  sure if i can carry on with any more.
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Compared to what Ive gone through you ladies have had it worse. Wishing you the best of luck.  I spoke to my bcn last week might as well spoke to a brick wall. All she goes on about are what her other ladies have done or there feelings.  Trying to sleep tonight but got some much going through my head. Going to be a long night..
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: I’ve got my oncology appointment on tues. Spoke to my breast nurse last week and she said the consultant wants me to have more chemo. I thought it had all finished. Got to talk it through with him, also when I was on chemo I had chest pains. The past few weeks chest pains have kicked off big time. Been to hospital,twice with them this week. Got to talk to him about my chest pains as well..
Posts.Title: Anyone refused radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Well done on finishing treatment. Bit worried as the breast which is swelling is my good one. Should get an appointment this week to get checked out..
Posts.Title: After treatment

Posts.Content: I finished my treatment in May for breast cancer.. The past 6weeks I’ve had like an ache in the breast we’re the cancer was. Mention to my breast nurse she said it could be things settling since my op. Had op in Jan. since last weekend I’ve had really bad pain in both breasts and my good breast is swollen. Finally got hold of my breast nurse. Rang tues and left a message got a call back fri evening..She’s making me @n appointment o be seen. Just wondered if any else has had problems since finishing treatment
Posts.Title: After treatment

Posts.Content: Hope everything goes ok. I was on the rosco trial. I had a mri scan after 4 sessions of chemo. Seeing a surgeon tomorrow about removing my lump..
Posts.Title: Update from oncologist.

Posts.Content: I had my lumpectomy and uplift on fri. Ended up staying in overnight. Wasn’t as bad as I thought it would be. I’m a bit sore but otherwise ok...
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: My support worker came to see me so went through some things with her,which has helped. Notice I’ve got a sore near one of my cuts where I had some tape. Will be keeping an eye on that. Friday got to go for a wound check so will get the nurse to check it.
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: Feeling emotional this morning. Not sure if it’s normal. Just want to cry...
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: Saw my breast nurse today she said it’s normal to feel like I do as I’ve been through a lot since finding out about my cancer.  Wounds healing and looks ok.
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: Thanks. Ended up going shopping and dragging my son with me to carry things. Came back and fell asleep. Sons cooking dinner tonight. Could get use to doing nothing.lol
Posts.Title: Had my op

Posts.Content: Hi I saw my doctor Tuesday about my hot flushes    Just finished 4 sessions of chemo. She’s given me fluoxetine. Fingers cross they work. Need some sleep..
Posts.Title: Help with hot flushes

Posts.Content: Hi Jo.  Sorry you’ve had to go this as well. I thought I was struggling but compared to what you’ve gone through, mine is nothing. I’m 51 as well. I was diagonosed on sept 8th. Started treatment 5 weeks later fir 13th of all days. First chemo waiting 3 hours before treatment so drained before I even started. Next day started with a headache which got worse, had some chest pain so ended up at a&e overnight then transferred to the hospital where I was having treatment. Ended up having a ct and mri scan to rule any bleed on the brain, luckily came back clear. Everything had caught up with and was put down to stress and anxiety. Ended up back in after being home a week with headaches back. Given meds which have help. 2nd session of chemo was ok till 4 days after then started with dizziness and shivering. Ended up in as thought it might be an infection, luckily it wasn’t. Turned out chemo meds are to strong for me and my body can’t cope with it so next time they will reduce the meds. Hope everything goes ok for you next time.  Shirley.x
Posts.Title: Reactions to chemo.

Posts.Content: Hi Flopsyuk.  I’m on the fec-t. I’m at clinic next week so will be talking through things with my consultant. Fed up of being stuck in for 2 weeks after my chemo, start to feel better then next lot is due. My nails having actually been stronger and have grown.  Shirley.xx
Posts.Title: Reactions to chemo.

Posts.Content: Ive had my 2nd lot of chemo on 5th Nov. Felt the usual headache and tired but after 4 days started with dizziness and shivering. Ended up at hospital thought just over night but was in for 5 days. Luckily no infection. After being in and out after the first chemo was hoping to avoid another hospital admission. Turns out the strength of chemo is to much and my body isn’t coping with it.. Dreading next weeks session as I’m so drained just can’t keep going in and out of hospital. My kids have been great but I’m feeling so sorry for myself leaving them everytime.  I’m a single parent so my daughter ended up at friends. Anyone else had side effects which have ended up in hospital.
Posts.Title: Reactions to chemo.

Posts.Content: I’m glad it’s working. I’d been gutted if they had told me it hadn’t of worked. Can relax abit over Christmas
Posts.Title: Mri results

Posts.Content: I had a mri scan today to find out if my cancer has shrunk. It’s gone from 17mm to 12mm after having 4 chemo sessions. I know it’s still early days but so glad there has been a change already.  I have to have a biopsy on the 2nd jan then see my oncologist to find out if if have an op to remove the lump or more chemo.  I as dreading more chemo because of the side effects but now I know there a change I’m not  to scared.. Best earlier Christmas present I could of wished for. My 13 yr old was crying on the phone at school when I told her..
Posts.Title: Mri results

Posts.Content: Thank you. Just need some energy to enjoy Christmas xxx
Posts.Title: Mri results

Posts.Content: Thanks, my lump is is at 11 o’clock position. Will have a few lymph nodes taken out just to check there not cancerous.  Will be on the look out for button down tops or nightshirts next week when I go  to town I think. I’m staying in overnight as I’m own my own with the kids and won’t be able to look after them.
Posts.Title: What to wear after a lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Thank you everyone. Will get some button down ones while I’m in hospital.
Posts.Title: What to wear after a lumpectomy

Posts.Content: I’m having a lumpectomy in 3 weeks time, just wondered what is best night wear to wear after. Will button down ones be better than over the head nightwear. Sorry if it sounds silly but not sure what ones to buy..
Posts.Title: What to wear after a lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Hi smoo.  I’m feeling the same I’ve got a lumpectomy same day as you. Keep asking myself why do we have to go through with it.. My anxiety is all over the place. Not eating properly or sleeping.  Hope everything goes ok for you.xx
Posts.Title: Feeling terrified

Posts.Content: I went to my doctors yesterday about my sweats she’s given me some tablets. Hope you can get sorted .xx
Posts.Title: Sweats awful
